name: Dots1ayer
description:
This is the first game I can say that I have completed.

It's a very basic, not-entirely-balanced top-down shooter, and the window name doesn't even match the game name*, but I finished a game and I'm proud of myself for it.

The game was in Game Maker Studio. The sprites were made in Paint.NET, an excellent 2D art program that basically operates like an advanced version of MS Paint.

Look forward to Unreal projects next.

*the window title is based off some awful half-reference to BSUAJ:G that I'm already embarrassed about for numerous reasons. Someone will one day look up this game, get back to me, and accost me for it; I'd like to pre-emptively apologize and assure you that the only reason why I didn't fix it before uploading it here is because I deleted the Game Maker project a long time ago when I thought that I had archived my projects (I did not).
